TranSiEng: Instant English Sinhala Translations Right in Your Browser

Immerse yourself in the world of online content without any language barriers! Whether you're navigating through foreign blogs, academic articles, or global news, "TranSiEng" provides instant word translations to enrich your browsing experience.

Key Features:

üîç On-the-fly Translations: Just select and hover! With TranSiEng, get real-time translations of words without diverting from your current tab.

üìö Contextual Suggestions: Enhance your vocabulary! Not only does TranSiEng provide immediate translations, but it also suggests related terms to ensure a comprehensive understanding.

üåê Seamless Integration: Designed to be non-intrusive, TranSiEng's sleek icon and tooltip only appear when you select a word, ensuring an uninterrupted browsing experience.

Usage:

Highlight & Hover: Simply drag your cursor over any word that piques your interest.
Click the Icon: An icon will appear near the selected word. One click and voil√†! The translation and related suggestions are presented in a neat tooltip.
Explore: Dive deeper into words with provided links, or continue your seamless browsing experience.

Where TranSiEng Shines:

From students conducting research to professionals navigating global platforms, or even curious souls exploring diverse content - TranSiEng is a tool designed for all. With its intuitive interface and accurate translations, TranSiEng aims to bridge language gaps, one word at a time.
